dataTemplate.name: FI_USERS_THAT_NEED_CONTACT_EMAIL
dataTemplate.description: Users That Need a Contact Email

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT glu.gl_user_gid user_id FROM gl_user glu WHERE glu.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND glu.gl_user_gid NOT IN ( SELECT contact_gid FROM contact WHERE domain_name='SCOULAR/FOOD') UNION SELECT glu.gl_user_gid user_id FROM gl_user glu INNER JOIN contact con ON glu.gl_user_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE glu.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND con.email_address IS NULL ORDER BY user_id
